short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ezy way to see how popular the article you're reading is across social networks

Available exclusively to EzyInsights customers.

Find out how the article you're reading is performing on social media with one click.

EzyInsights for Chrome shows you all engagement for a given article across major social media networks. See at a glance how fast the article is picking up engagement in real-time. Youâ€™ll also see a breakdown of other publishers and celebrities that have shared it on their own Facebook pages.
